item.title: Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket ‘Extradimensional Crisis’ expansion launches May 29
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/pokemon-trading-card-game-pocket-extradimensional-crisis-expansion-launches-may-29

  • Smartphone

Buzzwole, Guzzlord, and other Ultra Beasts join the fray.

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket expansion “Extradimension Crisis” will launch on May 29, The Pokemon Company announced.

The description reads: “In Extradimensional Crisis, players can collect Ultra Beast Pokemon as seen in the Pokemon Sun and Pokemon Moon video games, including Buzzwole ex, Blacephalon, Nihilego, and Guzzlord ex. Players will also be able to encounter more Pokemon from the Alola region, including the debut of Type: Null. In addition, an Ultra Beast-themed binder cover will be available to obtain through the Shop with shop tickets starting May 29, and a floral display board will be obtainable using event shop tickets gained through the upcoming wonder pick event between June 11 at 11:00 p.m. PT to June 28 at 10:59 p.m. PT.”

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket is available now for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play.

Watch a trailer for the expansion below.

Expansion “Extradimensional Crisis” Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Famitsu Sales: 5/12/25 – 5/18/25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/famitsu-sales-5-12-25-5-18-25

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Capcom Fighting Collection 2 opens at 11,985 retail copies sold.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the two weeks spanning May 12, 2025 to May 18, 2025.

Capcom Fighting Collection 2 was the highest selling new release of the week, moving 7,801 units on Switch and 4,184 units on PlayStation 4 for an opening week total of 11,985 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 24,478 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 6,546 units, the Xbox Series family sold 1,382 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 27 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [NSW] Capcom Fighting Collection 2 (Capcom, 05/16/25) – 7,801 (7,801)
  2. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 5,872 (1,300,401)
  3. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,869 (3,889,763)
  4. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 4,756 (8,128,580)
  5. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 4,275 (6,327,905)
  6. [PS4] Capcom Fighting Collection 2 (Capcom, 05/16/25) – 4,184 (4,184)
  7. [NSW] Tokimeki Memorial: forever with you Emotional (Konami, 05/08/25) – 3,170 (24,202)
  8. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) – 2,714 (1,585,602)
  9. [PS5] Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 (Kepler Interactive, 04/24/25) – 2,160 (15,239)
  10. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) – 1,932 (5,562,300)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on May 23.

  1. [PS5] DOOM: The Dark Ages (Bethesda Softworks, 05/15/25) – (New)

  4. [NSW] Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (Nintendo, 12/07/18) –
  5. [NSW] Donkey Kong Country Returns HD (Nintendo, 01/16/25) –
  6. [PS5] Monster Hunter Wilds (Capcom, 02/28/25) –
  7. [NSW] The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy (Aniplex, 04/24/25) –

  9. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –

  11. [NSW] Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition (Nintendo, 03/20/25) –

item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter 6 special collaboration announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/monster-hunter-wilds-x-street-fighter-6-special-collaboration-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out on May 28.

Capcom has announced a Street Fighter 6 special collaboration for Monster Hunter Wilds. It will launch on May 28 in the form of a new side mission with exclusive rewards, and additional paid downloadable content.

Here are the details:

■ Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration

A special collaboration with Capcom’s own fighting franchise Street Fighter 6 is now underway! Akuma—a demon of combat that has welcomed the Satsui no Hado into his being in his quest to become the ultimate master of the fist—makes his appearance in Monster Hunter Wilds! This collaboration has a host of fun new features that are sure to get you into the fighting spirit!

■ Content

Special collaboration-exclusive rewards have been added! Check out the exclusive special collaboration side mission to experience Akuma in action!

Claim special collaboration rewards by completing the new side mission Ultimate Strength, featuring Akuma! Complete the accompanying collab arena quests Demonic Strength and True Strength for additional rewards.

The side mission Ultimate Strength is available for hunters at HR 21 or higher. Talk to Quinn, the Vespae Unit handler, at the Oilwell Basin Base Camp to start the mission.

  • “Akuma” hunter full armor set and layered equipment.
  • “Blanka-Chan” Palico full armor set and layered equipment.
  • Hunter Profile background, nameplate, and pose.

Note: After its addition as a free update this collaboration will be a permanent addition to the game.

Unleash the Demon within!

You can unleash your inner demon by equipping the “Akuma” full armor set or full layered armor set. Equipping either set allows you to use Akuma’s unique item and gestures to perform his fighting moves!

Unleash Your Inner Akuma!

Experience the thrill of Street Fighter with the recreation of the Drive Impact, a system exclusive to Street Fighter 6, and more.

You can select Akuma’s actions from the Item Bar. Use the “Assisted Combo: Akuma” item command to branch out into various combo attacks and unleash special moves like Gou Hadoken and Gou Shoryuken.

  • The attack power of Akuma’s unique actions is determined by the main weapon you have equipped.
  • Equipping the full armor set boosts attack power considerably compared to using the full layered armor set, and Assisted Combos and other actions will gain stun properties while the Drive Impact action will gain an offset effect.

■ Paid Downloadable Content

Paid downloadable content will also be available from May 28, 2025 to further enhance the collaboration experience!

  • Alma Outfits
    • Chun-Li Outfit – SF6
    • Cammy Outfit – SF6
  • Pendant
    • Blanka-Chan Doll
  • Stickers
    • Street Fighter 6 Set
  • Gestures
    • Hadoken
    • Shoryuken
    • Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
    • Note: Gestures have attack properties.

Monster Hunter Wilds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration Trailer

English

Japanese
